page.title: 15EMPLOYMENT IN SHROTON
page.content: HALF THE HOUSEHOLDS CONSIST OF RETIRED PEOPLE WHO HAVE MOVED HERE FROM OTHER PARTS OF THE COUNTRY WITHIN THE LAST 10 YEARS. MOST OF THE WORKING POPULATION GO OUT OF THE VILLAGE TO WORK IN BLANDFORD OR SHAFTESBURY, POOLE, SALISBURY OR EVEN LONDON. THE OVERALL IMPRESSION IS OF A VARIETY OF OCCUPATIONS AS THERE IS NO DOMINANT INDUSTRY OR COMMERCIAL UNDERTAKING IN THE NEIGHBOURHOOD WHICH WOULD PROVIDE EMPLOYMENT FOR LARGE NUMBERS. THERE ARE SOME ARMY AND NAVAL OFFICERS WHO ARE AWAY A GREAT DEAL LEAVING THEIR WIVES AND FAMILIES HERE. THERE ARE TEACHERS FROM LOCAL STATE AND PRIVATE SCHOOLS, AN ARCHITECT, A DESIGNER, AN ESTATE AGENT,SEVERAL SHOP ASSISTANTS AND WAITRESSES AND A NUMBER OF LORRY DRIVERS. THERE IS ALSO A STONEMASON AND THERE ARE SEVERAL BUILDERS.
